content.html: Sure, when you just write out every outage we’ve had this year and then mention that there were other issues not even included in the list it sounds bad. But what if you DIDN’T write them out like this? Wouldn’t look so bad then, would it?
content.value:
Sure, when you just write out every outage we’ve had this year and then mention that there were other issues not even included in the list it sounds bad.

But what if you DIDN’T write them out like this? Wouldn’t look so bad then, would it?
